Description: Lazurde Company for Jewelry (Known as: Lazurde) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange Tadawul (TDWL) since June 2016. Lazurde operates within the Consumer Durables & Apparel sector focusing on Apparel, Accessories & Luxury Goods. It has Companies operating across Middle East focusing on Gold. Lazurde is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1992
